#Grep4j Usage

= Usage =

==Using Grep4j to grep Local or remote files==

{{{
Grep4j grep4j = grep(expression(), on(profiles()))
  		.withContextControls(getContextControls())
                .withWildcard(getWildcard())
  		.build();
grep4j.execute().andGetResults();

}}}

==Using Grep4j in your tests==


{{{
assertThat("fine", appears(exactly(3).times(), on(profiles)));
assertThat("ERROR", appears(atMost(2).times(), on(profiles)));
assertThat("ERROR", appears(atLeast(1).times(), on(profiles)));
assertThat("ERROR33", neverAppears(on(profiles)));
}}}
